Logan International.directions: Rental car row at airport. Gas station close use: Logan Airport Gulf - 100 Service Road

George Bush Intercontinental Airport.directions: Rental car row at airport all close to this station: Exxon - 15931 John F. Kennedy Blvd

San Diego International.directions: From the south on I-5 use: Shell - 2521 Pacific Highway
From the North and east use: Mobil - 1809 West Washington St.

William P. Hobby Airport.directions: All Eastbound on Airport Blvd to rental car rows can use: Chevron - 7050 Telephone Rd.
All Westbound on Airport Blvd use Airport Shell - 8610 Airport Blvd.

McCarran International.directions: If rental agency is on airport property
If rental agency is south of the airport in the cluster on Gilespie Street

Los Angeles International.directions: For airport onsite car rentals use: Shell - 5551 West Century Blvd
For offsite Enterprise rentals south of LAX

Fort Lauderdale/Hollywood International.directions: Driving Northbound on I-95 use: Mobil - 2109 Griffin Road
Driving Southbound on I-95 use: 7-11 - 1500 Florida 84

Seattle-Tacoma International.directions: Rental car row just outside of airport.  Driving Northbound from the south use: Circle K/Shell - 17040 International Blvd
Driving southbound from the north use: Arco AM/PM - 15252 Tukwila International Blvd.

Lambert-St. Louis International.directions: Thrifty and Dollar EB on I70 a car use: QuikTrip - 11444 Saint Charles Rock Road.
Thrifty and Dollar WB on I70 use: BP - 10500 Natural Bridge Rd.
Avis/Budget use: BP - 10500 Natural Bridge Rd.
Hertz and Alamo driving EB on I70 use: BP - 10500 Natural Bridge Rd.
Enterprise driving on I70 or I170 from the East

Newark Liberty International.directions: Most rental car agencies at airport.  Advantage and Alamo right offsite but should use same.  Gas onsite use: Gulf (24h) - 100 Linbergh Rd.

Kansas City International.directions: All rentals at airport use onsite gas station: KCI Car Care Center 426 Paris Kansas City MO

Honolulu International.directions: All rentals should use this offsite gas station: Shell - 2805 Ualena Street

Portland International.directions: All but Budget onsite and if coming from the South
If coming Southbound on 205 from WA
If renting from Budget offsite airport use: JL Mini Mart - 6021 Northeast Portland Highway

Philadelphia International.directions: Rental car row at airport.  Gas station offsite: Wawa - 8220 Bertram Avenue is closest and convenient.

Washington Dulles International.directions: Rental car row at airport.  Gas station onsite: Exxon/Circle K - 44910 Rudder Rd.

John F. Kennedy International.directions: Rental car row at airport.  Gas station near onsite: BP - 138 Federal Circle

Orlando International.directions: Driving Eastbound on SR528 use: 7-Eleven - 3911 McCoy Rd
Driving Westbound on SR528 use: 7-11 - 7018 Narcoossee Rd.
Driving Eastbound on SR417 use: Mobil 7-11 - 13451 Landstar Blvd.
Driving Westbound on SR417 use: 7-11 - 10601 Narcoossee Rd.

Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County.directions: Rental car row at airport.  All should use: BP - 9201 Middlebelt Road

Charlotte/Douglas International.directions: Rental car row at airport.  One offsite close: Airport Express - 6020 Wilkinson Blvd.

Phoenix Sky Harbor International.directions: Rental car row at airport.  Gas station offsite: Circle K - 699 E. Buckeye Rd

Pittsburgh International.directions: All rental cars onsite at airport.  Use Sunoco on the property - 1201 Airport Blvd.

San Francisco International.directions: Rental car center at airport use: Valero - 310 San bruno Avenue East

LaGuardia Airport.directions: Driving Westbound use: Mobil - 10801 Grand Central Parkway.
From Manhattan and New Jersey driving Eastbound use: Citgo - 8505 Astoria Blvd.

Midway International.directions: From the South on Rt. 50 use: Midway Gas Mart - 4710 West 63rd St.
From the North and East (near DT Chicago) use: 7-11 - 4353 West 55th St.
From the West and I-55 use: Mobil - 5448 West 55th St. Chicago.

Denver International.directions: Rental car row at airport.  Gas station onsite: Conoco/Circle K - 7680 Pena Blvd.

Baltimore-Washington International Thurg.directions: Rental car row offsite use: 7-11 - 1401 Dorsey Road

Hartsfield Jackson Atlanta International.directions: All rental cars are offsite.  Use: Chevron - 2407 Riverdale Road

Ronald Reagan Washington National.directions: For all rentals off site and on site around airport use: Exxon - 2300 Jefferson Davis Highway

Miami International.directions: All rental cars directly offsite can use: Shell Station - 2501 NW 42nd Ave. Miami

Dallas/Fort Worth International.directions: All rentals use an offsite rental car facility.  Use the station which is right near the entrance to the rental car facility on Rental Car Road. Valero/Stop & Go - 3950 Valley View Ln

Minneapolis-St. Paul International.directions: Rental car row at airport.  All should use: SuperAmerica - 5201 Post Road

Tampa International.directions: From North of Tampa and Pasco County on Veteran's Expressway use: Racetrac - 6507 West Hillsborough Ave.

O'Hare International.directions: Driving Southbound towards ORD on I-294 use: Mobil Station - 2380 South River Road
Driving Eastbound towards ORD on I-90 use either: 7-Eleven or Mobil on Toll Rest Stop - 1960 S. Mt. Prospect Rd
Driving Westbound towards ORD on I-90 use Mobil Station - 9401 West Higgins Road
Driving Northbound towards ORD on I-294 use: 7-Eleven - 4101 George PL

Salt Lake City International.directions: From the West on I-80  use: Roy's Phillips 66 - 5505 Amelia Earhart Drive
